room.description:
This is a large classroom. On the left there are computers located next to the wall and a small group of people playing video games. There is an admin writing kludgy code intensively. On the right, there are a few students discussing about some mathematical problem in front of a whiteboard. Tandem chess is being played in the middle of class. There is a couple of cookies in a package on the table.
There is a door south of you.
